Skin is the first defense of the body therefore it is necessary to keep the skin bacteria free, hygienic and clean. Body scrub can play very important part in keeping the skin clean by removing unwanted dead cell from the body, improving the circulatory system so that impurities and toxins are removed regularly from the body. Just use the body scrub twice or thrice a week in summers or winters and feel refreshed. Take the blue berry cream in your palm along with few drops of water or dry and apply to vulnerable areas like underarms, elbows, knees and feet and rub gently in cyclic motion until the scales of skin comes out. Just see the complexion of your skin immediately after the use and feel refreshed and cleansed. Blue berry extracts are highly rich in anti-oxidative properties and tone the skin. Also helps in removal of dead skin. It also improves the circulation of the skin and reverses the signs of aging like wrinkles, dry skin and age spots etc walnut shell scrub particles - the hard nut products naturally soft skin. The advantages of exfoliating have been recognized now and they are very important in preparing the skin for moisturisation and anti-age treatments. Immediate results of skin brightening are seen using the walnut scrub. details.description_text: Parachute SkinPure Deep Moisture Body Lotion: Parachute SkinPure Deep Moisture Body Lotion is a nourishing skincare solution enriched with the goodness of Coconut Milk and Shea Butter, designed to repair dry skin and promote glowing skin. Goodness of Coconut Milk and Shea Butter: This body lotion is enriched with Coconut Milk and Shea Butter, two natural ingredients renowned for their moisturizing and nourishing properties. Shea Butter helps to repair dry skin by providing intense hydration and restoring the skin's natural moisture barrier, while Coconut Milk contributes to naturally glowing and beautiful skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and radiant. Dry Skin Repair and Glowing Skin: Regular use of Parachute SkinPure Deep Moisture Body Lotion helps to repair dry skin and achieve glowing skin. The combination of Coconut Milk and Shea Butter works synergistically to deeply moisturize and hydrate the skin, replenishing lost moisture and improving overall skin texture and tone. 100% Natural Moisturizers: Parachute SkinPure Deep Moisture Body Lotion is made from 100% natural moisturizers, which nourish the skin from within. These natural moisturizers penetrate deep into the skin's layers, providing long-lasting hydration and leaving the skin feeling soft, supple, and revitalized. Suitable for All Skin Types: Parachute SkinPure Deep Moisture Body Lotion is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Its gentle yet effective formula ensures optimal hydration without greasiness or residue, making it ideal for daily use to maintain healthy, moisturized, and glowing skin. Incorporate it into your skincare routine for soft, smooth, and radiant-looking skin that lasts all day. No Harmful Chemicals: This product is free from harmful chemicals like silicones, parabens, and sulphates. Its gentle formula ensures that your skin receives pure, natural care without any potentially damaging ingredients. product_title: Laikou hyaluronic acid sodium hand serum 50ml

detail.name: Laikou hyaluronic acid sodium hand serum 50ml

details.description_text: The Laikou Hyaluronic Acid Sodium Hand Serum (50ml) is a hydrating and rejuvenating serum specially formulated for hands. It combines the moisturizing power of Hyaluronic Acid Sodium to deeply hydrate, improve skin elasticity, and repair dryness or rough texture, leaving hands soft and youthful-looking.Key Ingredients:Hyaluronic Acid Sodium:A humectant that draws moisture into the skin, providing long-lasting hydration. Improves skin elasticity and smoothness. Nourishing Extracts:Additional botanical or vitamin-based components may be included to nourish and soothe the skin. Benefits:Deep Hydration: Restores moisture to dry or cracked hands. Softens Skin: Leaves hands feeling smooth and supple. Anti-Aging: Reduces the appearance of fine lines and maintains skin elasticity. Fast Absorbing: Lightweight formula that doesn't leave a greasy residue. How to Use:Apply a small amount of the serum to clean, dry hands. Massage gently into the skin until fully absorbed. Reapply as needed, especially after washing hands or exposure to harsh conditions. Who It's For:Anyone dealing with dryness, roughness, or signs of aging on their hands. Ideal for frequent hand-washers or those exposed to drying conditions.
